items.sentence: That's something we must avoid, no matter what.
Tom didn't know that that would embarrass Mary.
Do you think we could survive a nuclear attack?
I hope that Tom doesn't think that we hate him.
If Tom would only rest, he'd get better faster.
Let's see how far we can go on one tank of gas.
Mary fell in love with a handsome Canadian man.
Mary is just a friend. She's not my girlfriend.
Tom and I have written several novels together.
Are you sure you want to wear that shirt today?
